backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI-related features and the files, components, and test IDs associated with them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering Hero, Timeline, and Proposal sections with a footer.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Cele: Generates falling hearts and warm-colored confetti particles with randomized animation properties.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with decorative warm gradient orbs, hearts, and styled headline text.
frontend/src/components/sections/Proposa: Interactive proposal UI with Yes/No buttons, moving No button logic, message cycling, and celebration animation trigger.
frontend/src/components/sections/Timelin: Timeline grid displaying relationship events with animated reveal on scroll.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalTimeline: Empty or missing file content; appears to be a placeholder for timeline navigation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity login, managing AuthClient creation, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Custom React hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element enters the viewport with optional threshold and one-time trigger.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables plus animations for theming, transitions, and decorative effects.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom OKLCH palettes.
project_state.json: JSON document tracking project state, requirements, issues, and design notes for the Proposal Day website.
